title: Muddy Waters - 'Mississippi' Live (1979; Legacy Edition 2003) [F
description:
Muddy 'Mississippi' Waters Live was Muddy's last live album released at his lifetime. The recording was awarded the Grammy for Best Ethnic or Traditional Folk Recording in 1979. The 2003 Legacy Edition contains the original album plus a second CD with recordings from the same events:

Harry Hope's, Cary, IL
Masonic Auditorium, Detroit, MI
March 18, 1977 - August, 26, 1978
